section.title: Unable to open Berkeley db /etc/sasldb2
section.para: If an error message frequently appears, that states:

para.screen: unable to open Berkeley db /etc/sasldb2: No such file or directory

section.para: This may be caused by Cyrus SASL attempting to iterate over all plugins available, and the sasldb plugin opening up the associated database file directly.
To resolve the error from occuring, remove the libsasldb.so files.
